itunes:title: 342 - This Powerful Study Shows The Right Context is as Crucial as Great Content
itunes:author: Co-Loop Podcast Network
itunes:summary:
Do you like your work better than ever but feel like people “get it” less? Have you ever made something that you were certain was your best work, but no one else seemed to notice? 

If you can’t figure out what’s wrong with your work and why it’s not working on people, it might not be your work that’s the problem at all. In this episode we will explore all the space around the essence of your work and learn ways to set the stage for your best work to truly shine!
itunes:subtitle:
Do you like your work better than ever but feel like people “get it” less? Have you ever made something that you were certain was your best work, but no one else seemed to notice? 

If you can’t figure out what’s wrong with your work and why it’s not working on people, it might not be your work that’s the problem at all. In this episode we will explore all the space around the essence of your work and learn ways to set the stage for your best work to truly shine!
itunes:keywords: creative pep talk, creativity, creative practice, design, fine art, andy j pizza, branding, creative career, art, illustration
